Saxmundham Mobile Library Route 3

Contact us:

Manager: Helen Hudson and Peter Fiske

Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Telephone: 01473 263838

Route timetable

Stop Village Location Time

3B Saxtead Green 1005 – 1020
3C Earl Soham Lay-by 1025 – 1040

3J Worlingworth Church Road 1435 – 1450
3K Saxtead Foxearth Nursing Home 1505 – 1525

Calling every 4 weeks on Thursdays in 2014:

2016: 14 January, 11 February, 10 March, 7 April, 5 May, 2 June, 30 June, 28 July, 25 August, 22 September, 20 October, 17 November, 15 December
